*********
Read Mail
*********

To read a message, you will need to click on the sender's name/email address depending on which is available, or the message subject, once a message is open, you'll be able to print, delete, reply or forward it to another email address.

Clicking on the arrow next to the sender's email address will reveal a little more information about the message and the sender.
